item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, I’m a software developer. I’m living in Saint-Petersburg, Russia. My main competence is iOS development. I can develop apps by using Objective-C, Swift or even JavaScript. I’m in love with programming and always trying to learn something new. On github you can found some examples of my work: Note taking app (WIP). This project doesn’t have good UI, but its build by using TDD with experimental approach to architecture; UITextView with markdown support (WIP) - project is at an early stage of developmen; List of languages that I used to program:
